attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I cannot believe that this government has decided to carry on with the 'John Lewis' list. It is an insult to every working person in this country.  Whilst we are struggling to maintain one home you feel it it justified that we the tax payer funds your second home. You have just lost the next election.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
